entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
